NeuroIndex is a hybrid **vector + semantic graph memory system** for embeddings.  
It provides:

- âœ… RAM-based LRU cache for fast lookups  
- âœ… FAISS vector search for large-scale similarity  
- âœ… Semantic graph traversal for relationship-aware queries  
- âœ… Persistent SQLite storage  

Perfect for AI document retrieval, chatbot memory, and semantic search workflows.

---

## Installation

```bash
git clone https://github.com/<your-username>/neuroindex.git
cd neuroindex
pip install -e .
